channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Shadow Dollar That's Fueling the Financial Underworld
item.description: Cryptocurrency Tether enables a parallel economy that operates beyond the reach of U.S. law enforcement.

item.title: Telsey maintains Market Perform rating on Restoration Hardware shares
The Boom in Zero-Day Options Is Coming for Tesla and Nvidia
item.description: Brokers and exchanges discuss expanding #0dte to options on individual stocks.

item.title: Palantir stock boosted by S&P 500 inclusion and long-term tech prospects, says BofA
China Harnesses a Technology That Vexed the West, Unlocking a Treasure Chest
item.description: Chinese companies are dominating a crucial industry by accessing a new source of minerals needed for electric-vehicle batteries.

item.title: India stocks higher at close of trade; Nifty 50 up 0.42%
A Guide to Why You Should Buy Bonds (and Why You Shouldn't)
item.description: Bonds have regained the haven property that made them desirable for 60/40 portfolios. But that may not matter as much as usually believed.

item.title: Cantor Fitzgerald highlights CVRx’s innovative heart failure treatment boosting stock
September Is Once Again a Tough Month for Stocks
item.description: The S&P 500 fell 4.2% last week on concerns about the health of the U.S. economy. Going back to 1928, September has been stocks’ weakest month of the ...

item.title: Cantor Fitzgerald maintains Overweight rating on Rubrik post earnings beat
